The content of the painted design in the work shown can best be described as

choices.label: abstract geometric patterns and stylized representations of plants
a combination of sacred symbols copied from Spanish religious art
a stylized map representing fields, settlements, and forests
abstract representations of the accomplishments of men

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
